Text: I didn't download this torrent but I got some of your others and just wanted to let you know that you're fucking awesome and I really appreciate what you're doing here. Thanks again dohduhdah

People
there's a fake user called Cryonica that is trying to demove people from sharing ttc lectures. This user is spreading gossips about IP tracing, sues and prosecutions, don't believe him! God bless you people.

Cryonica is not a fake user.
For instance, she uploaded "TTC - Mysteries of the Microscopic World" to Demonoid.

I am not a fake user!!! I have uploaded lots of torrents on Demonoid.  But I got a strange message telling me TGC are prosecuting anyone posting their new material using their IP address. So I wrote to other uploaders of TTC courses and asked them if they had the same message.  The fake user is more likely the person who sent me the message, which by the way I forwarded to the Demonoid administrator. That person has never uploaded anything.
I am still uploading these lectures but thanks in advance.Any news on "Engg.Circuit Analysis Vol.2 & 3" by MathTutorDVD ?
